# Hands Detail Shop - Business Information

## About
Hands Detail Shop is a premium mobile auto detailing service based in Arnold, PA, with 16 years of professional experience. Founded and operated by Nazir El, an Air Force veteran, we bring military precision and passion to every vehicle we service.

## Owner
**Nazir El**
- Title: CEO & Master Detailer
- Background: Air Force Veteran
- Experience: 16+ years in professional auto detailing
- Origin: Baton Rouge, Louisiana
- Training: Air Force diesel and jet engine specialist

## Services
We specialize in:
- Elite Detail Packages (starting at $145)
- Ceramic Coating ($500+)
- Paint Correction ($350+)
- Interior Detailing
- Mobile Detailing Services
- Monthly Residential Plans
- Commercial Fleet Services
- Yacht & Marine Detailing
- RV & Motorhome Services
- Motorcycle Detailing

## Contact Information
- **Business Name**: Hands Detail Shop
- **Phone**: (412) 752-8684
- **Address**: Mobile Service - Pittsburgh Area
- **Website**: https://handsdetailshop.com
- **Service Area**: Greater Pittsburgh Area (50-mile radius)

## Hours
- Monday - Saturday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Sunday: By Appointment Only

## Key Features
- Mobile service - we come to you
- Veteran-owned and operated
- Family-owned business
- Licensed & Insured
- Free estimates
- 5,000+ vehicles detailed
- Professional-grade equipment and products
- Satisfaction guaranteed

## Service Areas
Proudly serving Arnold, PA and the Greater Pittsburgh area including:
- Fox Chapel
- Sewickley Heights
- Upper St. Clair
- New Kensington
- Plum
- Murrysville
- And surrounding communities

## Payment Methods
- Cash
- Credit Card
- Debit Card
- Square

## Special Offers
- NEW YEAR SPECIAL: 15% OFF First-Time Customers
- FREE Tire Shine with Any Package
- $30 Deposit Secures Your Appointment
- Monthly membership plans available

## Philosophy
"Paying attention to detail is our driving factor" - We treat every vehicle with the same care and precision that the Air Force taught, whether it's a daily driver, luxury car, yacht, RV, or motorcycle.
